column1: in memory of ricky sidney dent -- coggins funeral home| facts born: november 20
column3: 2015 send card. ricky sidney dent. november 20
column9: 2015 at the upson regional medical center. mr. dent was born in upson county on november 20
column10: 1949 to the late sidney m. and fannie mae bloodworth dent. he was a member of valley grove baptist church. he is survived by his brother
column11: terry (terry) dent of thomaston; and nephew
column12: tim dent of thomaston. graveside services for mr. dent will be held monday june 15
column14: at 11:00 am at new harmony baptist church cemetery. in lieu of flowers
column15: memorial donations may be made to valley grove baptist church
